View

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    View of the game Observer - Observe if there is a change in player's action sequence, if there is then update the label (Wong Tiong Kiat)
    Author:
    Lim Yun Shen
